North.description: The ocean swirls and sways against the shore, sending a white mist inland like the breathy exhalations of some great monster. As you reach your hand outward, it encounters an impenetrable, unseen barrier hidden in the mist.

East.description: A man-like figure has been etched into the rocky face of the cliff. It stands alone in a circle of dancers and reaches out an arm to touch one of the young women on the head.

South.description: More dancers twist and bend in a circle to the south.

West.description: The misty spray coats your face and hands as you gaze westward. An impenetrable, invisible barrier stops your hand short as you reach out.

Up.description: The white mists form a seamless ceiling, enclosing this meadow in a globe of quiet air. Somehow, they seem... disapproving...

Down.description: The well-trampled grass still has some spring to it. It lashes about the dancers' ankles with a life of its own, trying to trip their steps and stop the dance.

extras.text: While being man-shaped, the figure is sexless. It stretches one hand towards a dancer collapsed among the others. A nearby dancer hides a dagger behind his back and is shown creeping up on the fallen one.
The cauldron is huge and iron. Its bottom glows with the heat of the fire. Inside, a delicious smelling concoction bubbles and splats.

rooms.name: In the Meadow
rooms.description: The dancers twist and turn, faces contorted in the ecstasy of the dance. They weave a pattern about a large pole plunged deeply into the ground and between several smaller poles set about the meadow. In and out of the pole circle they dance, endlessly... You can observe a different dance pattern to the north.

North.description: More dancers weave a circle to the north.

East.description: The white cliff of the peninsula rises above the meadow. On its face, someone has carved a scene that mimics that taking place here now -- with one difference. Instead of a pole, the dancers in this image circle a monstrous man-like figure.

South.description: The smooth white face of the cliff is broken by a carved image.

West.description: The white sea-spray roils restlessly on the edges of the meadow. For the first time you notice the pattern of twigs that line the sea's edge. As you reach past into the mists, your hand is immediately dripping wet. Something brushes your hand and into your mind someone says, quite emphatically "DO NOT!"

Up.description: White mists hang over the meadow, kept at bay by some unknown power. They drift down slowly, slowly... dissipating... but as you touch a single wisp, you get the feeling someone is very disapproving of this dance and wishes it would end.

Down.description: Rowan leaves lie scattered about in the grasses here.

extras.text: Do you want to look at the pole, the lesser pole, the image, or the figure?

A huge man-like figure cradles the tiny body of a young woman in its arms. It seems very protective. The young woman appears to be unconscious. Her delicately webbed hand hangs down past the figure's grasp. The sea laps about its huge lower end.
The figure is vaguely man-shaped, but sexless. Two dark eyes stare past you almost sightlessly. A wreath of hemlock adorns its head.
They are rowan twigs, stripped of their leaves.

The large center post rises twelve feet into the air. Carved from the trunk of a single rowan, it is now wound about with ribbons of green and red. From its top, multicolored ribbons explode downwards in cascades to the dancers who grip them as they weave their pattern between the lesser poles.

The smaller poles are barely three feet high. They, too have been wound from top to bottom in bright green and red ribbons. Baskets made of hemlock rest on them and have been filled with fish and seaweed.

rooms.name: In the Rabbit's Tunnel
rooms.description: Even after widening the opening, you find the space here very cramped. The surfaces around you have been worn smooth by the passage of some animal in and out of the hole. You can continue your descent or change your mind and go back up to the surface.

North.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

East.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

South.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

West.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

Up.description: The tunnel narrows before it opens into the clearing above you.

Down.description: The dark tunnel descends ahead of you.

rooms.name: In the Rabbit's Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel widens slightly here, making your passage easier. It also levels out as it winds to the west. The damp smell of freshly-turned earth masks any scent of the sea.

North.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

East.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

South.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

West.description: The damp tunnel widens ahead.

Up.description: The narrow tunnel leads up towards a faint patch of light a ways ahead.

Down.description: The earth is a little muddy beneath your feet. This hole must be a rain trap.

rooms.name: In the Rabbit's Tunnel
rooms.description: A thick, musky odor hits your nostrils as you round the corner of the tunnel. You begin to suspect that maybe this isn't a rabbit's tunnel after all. It continues to the north and to the east.

North.description: The dark tunnel continues ahead. As you tilt your head, you hear a low cough from the darkness.

East.description: The tunnel continues to the east.

South.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

West.description: Heavy claws have scarred the tunnel wall here.

Up.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

Down.description: The floor is a bit muddy, but otherwise pretty uninteresting.

extras.text: It looks like something is trying to widen the tunnel or, maybe, add a new branch to it.

rooms.name: In the Rabbit's Tunnel
rooms.description: The musky odor is almost overwhelming in this tunnel section. Just ahead of you, it plunges steeply downward. You can escape the odor to the south.

North.description: The damp earth wall is moister than usual here. Blech! No wonder that musty odor is so strong!

East.description: You see a damp earth wall, tightly packed.

South.description: The odor is much less horrendous in the tunnel section to the south.

West.description: A small puddle at the base of the wall sends up it's own little cloud of foul odor. Yuck. What could possibly live with this stench?

Up.description: The packed dirt has given way to white limestone above your head.

Down.description: A low cough sounds from a natural cave below you.

extras.text: The foul liquid feels slippery and smells very similar to ammonia. It's too dark here to detect color, but you have your suspicions.

rooms.name: A Foul-Smelling Cave
rooms.description: Small animal bones littered about the floor confirm your suspicions that this is no rabbit hole. At least, not what you would call normal rabbits. The musky odor in here reminds you vaguely of a skunk, but not quite as strong. Something scurries off at the edge of your vision. You can leave this putrid den up through the tunnel.

North.description: Rubbish of all types is mounded against the limestone wall of the cave.

East.description: Bones and scraps of hide litter the floor in front of the wall.

South.description: This corner is evidently the solid-waste depository.

West.description: A simple bed of loose fur, hide, and grass has been mounded against the wall.

Up.description: The tunnel leads up out of the stench.

Down.description: The floor is surprisingly dry beneath your feet, even if small bones crunch at your every step.

rooms.name: High in a Treetop
rooms.description: A subtle green glow surrounds the uppermost branches of this tree. It's not coming from the leaves at all! The glow makes the stand of trees below you seem almost eerie. As you lean closer to the top branches, trying for a better view, a wisp of wind passes through the boughs. It seems to whisper one word in your ear, "Forgive..."

North.description: It's far too windy to leave the shelter of the tree!

East.description: The strong east wind presses you back against the tree trunk.

South.description: The tree branches to the south are so tangled that passage through them is impossible.

West.description: The back of a tall, gray stone fills your vision. It's so wrapped up with branches that it's impossible to go around it at this height.

Up.description: It's far too windy to go up from here!

Down.description: A pleasant stand of trees waits for you below.

extras.text: The branches seem to be covered with a luminescent fungus of some type. It crumples beneath your fingers as you touch it, releasing a scent that reminds you of dried seaweed.

rooms.name: Over the Sea
rooms.description: Your mind reels as though impacted by some great force and a sorrowful sob fills your ears! The world spins about you and you find yourself spun so fast through the air that you lose all sense of orientation!

North.description: A great force prevents your passage!

East.description: A great force prevents your passage!

South.description: A great force prevents your passage!

West.description: A great force prevents your passage!

Up.description: A force like a monstrous hand presses down on you, herding you lower!

Down.description: Down is the only way out!

rooms.name: Over the Sea
rooms.description: Your mind reels as though impacted by some great force and a sorrowful sob fills your ears! The world spins about you and you find yourself spun so fast through the air that you lose all sense of orientation! Falling, spinning end over end.... you're lost...!

North.description: A great force prevents your passage!

East.description: A great force prevents your passage!

South.description: A great force prevents your passage!

West.description: A great force prevents your passage!

Up.description: A force like a monstrous hand presses down on you, herding you lower!

Down.description: Down is the only way out!

North.description: A great force prevents your passage!

East.description: A great force prevents your passage!

South.description: A great force prevents your passage!

West.description: A great force prevents your passage!

Up.description: A force like a monstrous hand presses down on you, herding you lower!

Down.description: Down is the only way out!

rooms.name: Over the Sea
rooms.description: Your mind reels as though impacted by some great force and a sorrowful sob fills your ears! The world spins about you and you find yourself spun so fast through the air that you lose all sense of orientation! Falling, spinning end over end.... you're lost...!

North.description: A great force prevents your passage!

East.description: A great force prevents your passage!

South.description: A great force prevents your passage!

West.description: A great force prevents your passage!

Up.description: A force like a monstrous hand presses down on you, herding you lower!

Down.description: Down is the only way out!

rooms.name: Over the Sea
rooms.description: You catch one last glimpse of the ledge to your south before the mists swirl and close around you. Some force spins you about in air. You lose all sense of direction. A sense of forboding closes in on your heart...

North.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

East.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

South.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

West.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

Up.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

Down.description: Down is the only way the mists will let you go!

rooms.name: Over the Sea
rooms.description: You can barely see the outline of the gravelled ledge to your south through the misty air. Some force batters you from side to side, but doesn't seem to be able to really control you. Below, the sea crashes into the shore.

North.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

East.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

South.description: The ledge and firm, safe land look very inviting!

West.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

Up.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

Down.description: The mists thicken below you until you can barely make out the waves heaving against the land far below. There's a bright spot of color barely visible through the froth...

rooms.name: Over the Sea
rooms.description: You catch one last glimpse of the ledge to your south before the mists swirl and close around you. Some force spins you about in air. You lose all sense of direction. A sense of forboding closes in on your heart...

North.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

East.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

South.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

West.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

Up.description: The mists won't let you pass this way!

Down.description: Down is the only way the mists will let you go!

rooms.name: Over the Sea
rooms.description: You hang suspended in the mists. Or are you falling? It's so hard to tell... Only the wind whistling past your ears gives you any clue about motion. There is no true up, down, east, west, south, or north. You are lost.

North.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

East.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

South.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

West.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

Up.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

Down.description: The mists yield ahead of you, allowing safe passage.

extras.text: The white mists close in on you from all directions, swathing you in a cool blanket. An overwhelming sense of sadness and wrongness makes you choke back tears.

rooms.name: Over the Sea
rooms.description: You hang suspended in the mists. Or are you falling? It's so hard to tell... Only the wind whistling past your ears gives you any clue about motion. You can see the cliff's edge above you and the dimly lit ocean far below.

North.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

East.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

South.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

West.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

Up.description: The top of the cliff is just a short distance up.

Down.description: The ocean far below you seems strangely calm.

extras.text: The white mists close in on you from all directions, swathing you in a cool blanket. An overwhelming sense of sadness and wrongness makes you choke back tears.

West.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

Up.description: The cliff soars up above you, barely visible in the thickening mists.

Down.description: The ocean below you seems strangely calm.

rooms.description: You hang suspended in the mists. Or are you falling? It's so hard to tell... Only the wind whistling past your ears gives you any clue about motion. You can see the cliff's edge far above you and the dimly lit ocean below.

rooms.name: A Crevice in the Cliff
rooms.description: You find yourself on solid ground at last. This tiny outcropping of rock is entirely concealed in the mists that surround the area. An overhang protects it from prying eyes even on days that have more normal weather. It is surprisingly dry. Bundles of grass have been carefully laid out in a soft pad against one wall. An inscription is carved into the east wall.

North.description: The mists lie waiting patiently to embrace you with cold hands once more.

East.description: Someone has taken the time to not only inscribe the words, but to make them stand out by rubbing a dark red substance into them.

South.description: The solid rock of the crevice leads upwards into an overhang.

West.description: The mists lie waiting patiently to embrace you with cold hands once more.

Up.description: The overhang looks pretty solid.

Down.description: The uneven floor of the crevice is very solid.

extras.text: The fresh grasses smell strongly of the ocean. What an aromatic bed! Hemlock leaves have been woven into the grasses, providing an extra tang.
Old, dried blood is solidly caked into the inscription. It's glowing with a malevolent light.

One wish only asked of thee! One wish only granted me! Malicious watcher, cursed be! No more wishes granted to THEE! Foul Rowan by Hemlock cleansed, Ocean's breath sent to avenge, Sea's rage never bends! To this madness, bring an end!

rooms.name: Over the Sea
rooms.description: You hang suspended in the mists. Or are you falling? It's so hard to tell... Only the wind whistling past your ears gives you any clue about motion. The mists here swirl with more energy than you've seen elsewhere and anger overwhelms the sadness. Something very dark looms in the mists to your east.

North.description: The mists yield ahead of you, allowing safe passage.

East.description: The mists yield reluctantly to your passage.

South.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

West.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

Up.description: The mists resist your passage in this direction.

Down.description: The mists yield ahead of you, allowing safe passage.

rooms.name: Somewhere in the Mists
rooms.description: The white mists surround you on all sides, stealing your sense of direction. Strange forms appear and disappear at the edge of your vision. You whirl, but they are gone before you can truly make out what they were. The ocean around you is completely, eerily still. Tiny waves move toward what you think might be the south, but it's difficult to say for sure in this directionless limbo. A haunting melody draws you forward but is gone before you can trace it.

North.description: The mists force you back, away... Some power prevents you from proceeding in this direction.

East.description: The mists force you back, away... Some power prevents you from proceeding in this direction.

South.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

West.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

Up.description: The mists above are so thick that they are totally impenetrable.

Down.description: The waters of the ocean are hauntingly still as though drained... their awesome strength channelled elsewhere...

extras.text: The white mist almost seems to have a life of its own, running cool tendrils through your hair and down your spine... haunting you with its touch like a ghostly lover's cold caress.
The miniature wavelets march southward steadily. Any sound of their minor collision with shore drowned totally by the malevolent mists.

rooms.name: A Rock in the Mists
rooms.description: A huge chunk of rock has fallen here from above and now stands as an anchor point for those lost in the mists. Seaweed drapes its sides. Tiny crustaceans scuttle about in their search for food. Small tidal pools dot the slick surface.

North.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

East.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

South.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

West.description: The dark hulk of the rock extends to your west.

Up.description: The mists above are so thick that they are totally impenetrable.

Down.description: How strange. One of the holes in the rock contains no water. It looks fairly deep...

extras.text: The miniature crabs dash sideways between the pools in an effort to get out of your path.
The small tidal pools are full of life. They must be recharged on a regular basis.
The ever-present algae looks pretty slimy.
It is damp, but contains no water. It looks deep.

You whirl, but they are gone before you can truly make out what they were. The ocean around you is gently ruffled by a very faint breeze intruding from far above. Tiny waves lap against the stone of the headland to your south and around the body of a young woman bobbing in the shallows...

North.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

South.description: The sheer, unclimbable face of the headland looms before you.

West.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

Up.description: The mists lighten above you allowing you to pass upwards... if you can fly...

Down.description: Small rowan twigs and leaves float forlornly in the waters.

extras.text: The webbing between her fingers seems longer than most people would consider to be normal. It begins to crumble into dust as you look!

The woman is dressed in a flowing white robe that has had the front slit open. Across her belly, someone has carved a circle with multiple lines that weave in and out around each other. She must have fallen here from the top of the cliff. A fresh wreath of hemlock and rowan still sits upon her head. Something seems odd about her hands.
The white mist almost seems to have a life of its own, running cool tendrils through your hair and down your spine... haunting you with its touch like a ghostly lover's cold caress.
The miniature wavelets march southward steadily. Any sound of their minor collision with shore drowned totally by the malevolent mists.

rooms.description: The white mists surround you on every side but one, stealing your sense of direction. Strange forms appear and disappear at the edge of your vision. You whirl, but they are gone before you can truly make out what they were. The ocean around you is completely, eerily still. Tiny waves lap against the stone of the headland to your south. The haunting melody sifts through the air...

North.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

East.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

South.description: The sheer, unclimbable face of the headland looms before you.

West.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

Up.description: There is a small break in the mists above you.

Down.description: Two lone rowan leaves skim the water here at the very edge of the land.

extras.text: The miniature wavelets march southward steadily. Any sound of their minor collision with shore drowned totally by the malevolent mists.
The white mist almost seems to have a life of its own, running cool tendrils through your hair and down your spine... haunting you with its touch like a ghostly lover's cold caress.

rooms.name: Somewhere in the Mists
rooms.description: Strange forms appear and disappear at the edge of your vision, but fade into the white mists before you can truly get a fix on them. The ocean around you is completely, eerily still. Tiny waves lap back and forth, without seeming to go anywhere. A haunting melody draws you forward to the north...

North.description: A dark rock cuts through the mists like a knife to your south.

East.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

South.description: The mists force you back, away... Some power prevents you from proceeding in this direction.

West.description: The mists swirl softly ahead of you, taking new forms and inviting your passage.

Up.description: The mists above are so thick that they are totally impenetrable.

Down.description: The waters of the ocean are hauntingly still as though drained... their awesome strength channelled elsewhere...

extras.text: The miniature wavelets march southward steadily. Any sound of their minor collision with shore drowned totally by the malevolent mists.

rooms.name: A Sea-side Cave
rooms.description: The soft melody echoes in this dank cave. The concealing strands of seaweed sway in time across the doorway to the north. A splash sounds out of the darkness to your west as something dives into the water. The rough rock walls are coated with more bits of seaweed and slime.

North.description: The long strands of seaweed sway to and fro with the ocean's surges. You can see the ever-present white mists waiting for you outside the cave.

East.description: Strands of seaweed and several flopping fish caught in the rocks tell you that this cave is probably underwater at high tide.

South.description: Strands of seaweed and several flopping fish caught in the rocks tell you that this cave is probably underwater at high tide.

West.description: The sea water sloshes along ahead of you into darkness...

Up.description: Strands of seaweed dangle down from the ceiling like the unkempt hair of some oceanic hag.

Down.description: Cold water swirls around your knees and pushes you back and forth with the movement of the ocean. While not deep, no light seems to be able to penetrate below the surface.

rooms.name: A Sea-side Cave
rooms.description: The sweet odor of death laces about the scent of the sea. Shallow waves wash about as something moves through the water. Seaweeds dangle from the ceiling, brushing across your face. Or.. is it seaweed?

North.description: Weeds and dead fish lie everywhere among the rocks and crevices of the wall.

East.description: Sea water washes in and out of the cave in a slow rhythm.

South.description: Darkness greets you with baited breath, refusing to yield its secrets.

West.description: Seaweed lies in tangled eddies up and down the wall where it was swept during the last tide. Dead fish stare back at you with sightless eyes from death traps caused by the same swells that lured them into the cave.

Up.description: Seaweeds dangle from the ceiling of the chamber, reaching down long, slimy tendrils to flap against the water's swells.

Down.description: The cold salt water rises and falls gently, but rises a little higher each time. The tide must be coming in.

rooms.name: A Sea-side Cave
rooms.description: Seaweed covers every surface of this chamber in a unkempt heap. Walls, ceiling, even the water is hidden beneath the slimy algae. Streamers reach down from above to connect themselves to the water's mat. Dead fish, a dead octopus, and live snails lie everywhere in the mess. Your nose is feeling a little overwhelmed at the odor.

North.description: It's impossible to see past the dangling weeds into the other section of the cave.

East.description: The walls are hidden behind an impervious web of seaweed.

South.description: The walls are hidden behind an impervious web of seaweed.

West.description: The walls are hidden behind an impervious web of seaweed.

Up.description: Long strands of seaweed dangle from the mat woven above. This doesn't look like a random weave...

Down.description: The water is invisible beneath the woven carpet of seaweed. At first glance, you'd almost think that you were standing in a grassy meadow, not treading in sea water.

rooms.name: A Hole in the Rock
rooms.description: The narrow chimney of rock presses in on you from all sides. The sharp edges threaten to rip through to your skin. The sides are slick beneath your hands, but not as wet as they should be. The odor of rotting fish fills the air around you and you suppress a gag.

North.description: The sharp rock edges are covered with fetid slime. It clings to your fingers, then drops with a disgusting PLOP!

East.description: The sharp rock edges are covered with fetid slime. It clings to your fingers, then drops with a disgusting PLOP!

South.description: The sharp rock edges are covered with fetid slime. It clings to your fingers, then drops with a disgusting PLOP!

West.description: White mist spins inside a narrow, circular slit in the wall.

Up.description: A shimmering energy field holds out the water that tries to splash down from above, but allows living objects to pass. Someone powerful went to a lot of trouble to keep this hole relatively dry.

Down.description: A small puddle of water at the very bottom of the hole indicates that the hole has not been completely sealed off from water.

rooms.name: Seinneadair's Refuge
rooms.description: The tiny chamber inside the rock has been converted into a homey refuge. A comfortable mound of seaweed doubles as bed or chair. Mysterious bottles and vials line the natural shelves. The scent of the open ocean is everywhere while the unpleasant tang of rotting fish is notable by its absence. The south wall has been converted into an altar of sorts. Sprays of hemlock have been tucked into each corner.

North.description: Bottles and vials sit along natural stone shelves.

East.description: A small stone door blocks the exit from intruders.

South.description: A small stone shelf has been converted into an altar of sorts.

West.description: Bottles and vials sit upon several natural stone shelves.

Up.description: Small sprays of hemlock twigs have been affixed to each corner of the chamber's ceiling.

Down.description: A surprisingly comfortable carpet of hemlock boughs and seaweed graces the floor of the cave.

extras.text: The hand-woven figure looks vaguely man-like.
The simple stone altar holds a hand-woven figure of hemlock, the carved figure of a fish, and one small hemlock branch.
Dark amber fluid lies thickly in the bottles and vials. It looks like a stock of one substance, just packaged differently.
The seaweed smells of fresh ocean waves and salt air. It has been mounded to receive a humanoid body very comfortably.

rooms.name: The Sea's Clutches
rooms.description: You splash down into cold water. It enfolds you in a deep green embrace. The water fills your eyes, ears, and mouth until your senses are clogged, leaving you with the sole impression of something drawing you down, deeper.

North.description: The water fills your eyes until you cannot see!

East.description: The water fills your eyes until you cannot see!

South.description: The water fills your eyes until you cannot see!

West.description: The water fills your eyes until you cannot see!

Up.description: Water fills your vision. There is no return this way!

Down.description: Something urges you down, deeper into the oceans secrets...

rooms.name: The Sea's Clutches
rooms.description: The water surrounds you completely in a cool green embrace. You shiver slightly, then wonder why you are shaking. Not only are you perfectly warm and comfortable, but a bubble of air surrounds you, allowing you to breathe easily. A soft glow brightens and then fades to your south.

North.description: As you press your hand into the edge of the air bubble, it is met by an equal force preventing you from passing this way.

East.description: As you press your hand into the edge of the air bubble, it is met by an equal force preventing you from passing this way.

South.description: A soft green glow is centered to your south like a beacon.

West.description: As you press your hand into the edge of the air bubble, it is met by an equal force preventing you from passing this way.

Up.description: As you press your hand into the edge of the air bubble, it is met by an equal force preventing you from passing this way.

Down.description: As you press your hand into the edge of the air bubble, it is met by an equal force preventing you from passing this way.

extras.text: The bubble shimmers slightly as it bobs about in the ocean current. Thin, yet... it doesn't seem to be subject to the bursting wimsies of its lesser cousins. You hope.

rooms.name: An Underwater Cave
rooms.description: After a disorienting wrench to your gut, you find yourself in a cave. Four stone doors stare back at you as you look about. You note that a different symbol has been carved above each doorway. However, the most remarkable thing in the room is the glowing message suspended in midair before you.

North.description: The stone door is crowned by the symbol of ocean waves.

East.description: The stone door is crowned by the symbol of a rowan leaf.

South.description: The stone door is crowned by the symbol of a dancing woman.

West.description: The stone door is crowned by the symbol of a hemlock leaf.

Up.description: The ceiling of the cave is clear green water! There is no sign of anything to hold it up.

Down.description: The stone here has been smoothed to a glass-like sheen. It looks very solid.

extras.text: The true of heart shall know me.
Do you want to look north, south, east, or west?

rooms.name: Beneath the Sea
rooms.description: Salt air fills your nostrils. Soft waves tinkle merrily against the shore. A storm rages in the distance. Overhead, a gull cries out to its fellows in raucous joy. Gentle green light brightens the room like a guiding beacon from a lighthouse. A fish splashes behind you. The soul of the sea is embodied here. This one room of indeterminate size holds all the vastness, the depth, the splendor... the heart.

North.description: Your head whirls as you try to encompass much too much for your mind to process in a lifetime, let alone one glance.

East.description: Your head whirls as you try to encompass much too much for your mind to process in a lifetime, let alone one glance.

South.description: Your head whirls as you try to encompass much too much for your mind to process in a lifetime, let alone one glance.

West.description: Your head whirls as you try to encompass much too much for your mind to process in a lifetime, let alone one glance.

Up.description: A small patch of seaweed sits in the middle of the glassy bubble overhead.

Down.description: Fine sand of purest white covers the floor of this wondrous lair.

extras.text: The clump of seaweed is suspiciously square, reminding you of a door.
